ya5.1.2:3.1: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, na dukkhaṁ. Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ dukkhañceva dukkhasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:5.1: Samudayasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso samudayo, na samudayasaccaṁ. Samudayasaccaṁ samudayo ceva samudayasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:8.1: Nirodhasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso nirodho, na nirodhasaccaṁ. Nirodhasaccaṁ nirodho ceva nirodhasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:11.1: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso maggo, na maggasaccaṁ. Maggasaccaṁ maggo ceva maggasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:14.1: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na dukkhaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ. Dukkhañca dukkhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:18.1: Samudayasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na samudayasaccaṁ, samudayo. Samudayañca samudayasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva samudayo na ca samudayasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:21.1: Nirodhasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodho. Nirodhañca nirodhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva nirodho na ca nirodhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:24.1: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso na maggasaccaṁ, maggo. Maggañca maggasaccañca ṭhapetvā avaseso na ceva maggo na ca maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:27.1: Samudayasaccaṁ saccañceva samudayasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na samudayasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:30.1: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:32.1: Samudayasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso samudayo, na samudayasaccaṁ. Samudayasaccaṁ samudayo ceva samudayasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:33.1: « Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā maggasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:34.1: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:36.1: Nirodhasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso nirodho, na nirodhasaccaṁ. Nirodhasaccaṁ nirodho ceva nirodhasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:37.1: « Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā samudayasaccanti? …pe… Saccā maggasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:38.1: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:40.1: Maggasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso maggo, na maggasaccaṁ. Maggasaccaṁ maggo ceva maggasaccañca.
ya5.1.2:41.1: « Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā samudayasaccanti? …pe… Saccā nirodhasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:42.1: Nirodhasaccaṁ saccañceva nirodhasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na nirodhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:44.1: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na dukkhaṁ, dukkhasaccaṁ. Dukkhañca dukkhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:47.1: Kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na dukkhaṁ, dukkhasaccaṁ. Dukkhañca dukkhasaccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:48.1: « Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na maggasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:52.1: « Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na maggasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:54.1: « Na saccā na dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na samudayasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na maggasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:58.1: « Na saccā na samudayasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:61.1: Dukkhasaccaṁ saccañceva dukkhasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na dukkhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:66.1: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:68.1: Dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na dukkhaṁ, saccā. Dukkhañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:73.1: Maggaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na maggo, saccā. Maggañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva maggo na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:77.1: Samudayasaccaṁ saccañceva samudayasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na samudayasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:80.1: Maggasaccaṁ saccañceva maggasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na maggasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:84.1: « Saccā dukkhasaccanti? …pe… Saccā samudayasaccanti? …pe… Saccā nirodhasaccanti?
ya5.1.2:85.1: Nirodhasaccaṁ saccañceva nirodhasaccañca. Avasesā saccā na nirodhasaccaṁ.
ya5.1.2:87.1: Dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na dukkhaṁ, saccā. Dukkhañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:90.1: Dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na dukkhaṁ, saccā. Dukkhañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:91.1: « Na saccā na nirodhasaccanti? …pe… Na saccā na maggasaccanti? Āmantā.
ya5.1.2:93.1: Samudayaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na samudayo, saccā. Samudayañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva samudayo na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:98.1: Maggaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na maggo, saccā. Maggañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva maggo na ca saccā.
ya5.1.2:101.1: Maggaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā saccā na maggo, saccā. Maggañca saccañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva maggo na ca saccā.
